description: This file provides utility functions related to behavior color mapping and options retrieval within a behavior palette, used likely for UI filtering and display purposes.

methods.name: export function getBehaviorColor(type: string): string { getBehaviorColor
methods.description: Returns a color string associated with a behavior type, defaulting to muted text if the type is not among the defined behaviors.

methods.name: export function getAllBehaviorOptions(): { label: BehaviorId; value: BehaviorId }[] { getAllBehaviorOptions
methods.description: Returns all defined behaviors as label/value pairs for use in filters or dropdown menus.

ctags.name: getAllBehaviorOptions
ctags.pattern: /^export function getAllBehaviorOptions(): { label: BehaviorId; value: BehaviorId }[] {$/

ctags.name: t
ctags.pattern: /^  const t = (EXACT_BEHAVIORS as string[]).includes(type) ? (type as BehaviorId) : null;$/
